reviewText: I really love this dvd and cd set on psychic development. It clearly shows you how to develop each and the meditations are fabulous. It even has one for your computer where you can test your psychic abilities. If you are a beginner you really need to get this. Even advance can benefit from it too especially the meditations.

The DVD was revealing and impressive to people who only concentrate on conscious activity.  Psychic Smarts reveals a world of unconsciousness which is the second mind in us. The recogition of this mind is the POWER that changes human life.  It is wonderful to come into this knowledge and understanding.

Psychic Smarts is a unique and eclectic approach to self-improvement.
It's made me more fully realize that I can change my life by changing my thinking.
Psychic Smarts gave me many ideas to change my thinking. Teaching me how to talk to and direct my subconscious mind was very empowering. I highly recommend it.

Psychic smarts offers many ways to "talk to" my unconscious mind. I'm able to easily integrate several techniques into my everyday life. I especially like the fact that there are so many ideas to choose from, as some techniques appeal to me more than others on a given day. This is a very practical and down to earth approach to the very complicated subject of developing my clairvoyant skills and directing my unconscious mind.
I think the meditation/relaxation DVD is very useful. It is easy to use and pretty straight forward so that the listener can practice this skill in a safe and effective way.
The two meditations were great! Helped me create a space in my mind for solitude, relaxation and creativity. Great spiritual guidance. Good for the soul!
